name: Fusilli With Basil, Mint, Spinach and Ricotta Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup well-drained, chopped frozen spinach (thawed) or blanched fresh spinach leaves
1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, plus more for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine the basil, mint, spinach, Parmesan, butter, garlic, salt and pepper in the bowl of a food processor and process until fairly smooth. Add the ricotta and pulse until combined. When the pasta is tender, drain, reserving 1 tablespoon of the water it cooked in. Transfer the hot pasta to a bowl and toss with the herb-and-ricotta mixture and the reserved tablespoon of cooking water. Sprinkle the pasta with the bacon and serve immediately with freshly ground black pepper on the side.
